english.segment1: Im forgiven because You were forsaken. Im accepted, You were condemned. Im alive and well, Your Spirit is within me. Because You died and rose again
english.segment2: Amazing love, how can it be. That You, my King, should die for me?. Amazing love, I know its true. Its my joy to honor You. In all I do, to honor You
english.segment3: You are my King. You are my King. Jesus, You are my King. You are my King
